titleStmt.title: A speech spoken in the House of Commons, by the Reverend Father in God, Robert, L. Bishop of Coventry and Lichfield. Being brought to the barre to answer for himselfe.
titleStmt.author: Wright, Robert, 1560-1643.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R. B. for Richard Lownds, and are to be sold at his Shop without Ludgate,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
